mapper.select:
select
distinct
F_GetTableText('T_DM_CFMD', 'code', 'name', CFMD) cfmd, F_GetTableText('T_DM_CGSQLX', 'code', 'name', CGLX) cglx, F_GetTableText('T_DM_XB', 'code', 'name', XB) xb, F_GetTableText('T_DM_CGSPJG', 'code', 'name', SHJG) shjg, F_GetTableText('T_CG_TZJH', 'TZID', 'TZH', TZID) tzid, F_GetTableText('T_CG_RWZXQKFK', 'CGID', 'TZZDW', CGID) ssejdw,
cgid, xm, csrq, csd, hjszd, sfzh, ks, zw, zc, lxdh, email, nncfcs, qtshrz, cfgj, rjcs, cfksrq, cfjsrq, cfmd_qt, yqr_xm, yqr_zw, yqr_dw, yqr_xxdz, yqr_dh, yqr_xm_en, yqr_zw_en, yqr_dw_en, yqr_xxdz_en, yqr_dh_en, jfly, jfysmx, jfyshj, sqbsm, sqrq, status, shry, shyj, shrq, gdwjid, cfzjbgid, valid, create_time, operator
